title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Enterprise, Trade and Employment
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Enterprise, Trade and Employment 

(Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2025. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 2 June 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited enterprise trade employment (alteration name department title minister) order 2025 (2) order come operation 2 june 2025

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in
text_raw:
2. The name of the Department of State, the present name of which is, in 
the Irish language, an Roinn Fiontar, Trádála agus Fostaíochta and, in the 
English language, the Department of Enterprise, Trade and Employment, is 
altered, in the Irish language, to that of an Roinn Fiontar, Turasóireachta agus 
Fostaíochta and, in the English language, to that of the Department of Enterprise, 
Tourism and Employment.
text_norm: 2 name department state present name irish language roinn fiontar tradala agus fostaiochta english language department enterprise trade employment altered irish language roinn fiontar turasoireachta agus fostaiochta english language department enterprise tourism employment

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: 3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose
text_raw:
3. The title of the Minister having charge of the Department of State, whose 
present title is, in the Irish language, an tAire Fiontar, Trádála agus Fostaíochta 
and, in the English language, the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment 
is altered, in the Irish language, to that of an tAire Fiontar, Turasóireachta agus 
Fostaíochta and, in the English language, to that of the Minister for Enterprise, 
Tourism and Employment.
text_norm: 3 title minister charge department state whose present title irish language taire fiontar tradala agus fostaiochta english language minister enterprise trade employment altered irish language taire fiontar turasoireachta agus fostaiochta english language minister enterprise tourism employment

title: of the Ministers and Secretaries (Amendment) Act 1939 (No. 36 of 1939),
heading: In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment –
text_raw:
4. 

In any enactment or any instrument made under an enactment – 

(a) 

(b) 

to 

the Department of Enterprise, Trade and 
references 
Employment shall be construed as references to the Department 
of Enterprise, Tourism and Employment, and 

references to the Minister for Enterprise, Trade and Employment 
shall be construed as references to the Minister for Enterprise, 
Tourism and Employment. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

6 May, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 9th May, 2025.
